name: University Common Core Requirement
descriptions: Requirement

Common core program comprises a set of credit requirements in the following broad core areas, totalling 36 units (out of a total of 120 units for the degree program). In general, students are expected to complete the majority of the common core credits in Year 1 and Year 2.
If you are interested in a particular Common Core course, please check the official course list at the UCE website (http://uce.ust.hk).
